string-array.item: Project creation in Atmel Studio, compilation, firmware, etc. plus project creation in Proteus.
A little theory about the I / O ports of AVR microcontrollers - how they are arranged, what they can, how and in which registers they are configured.
To demonstrate how to work with ports in the C language, we write a small program in Atmel Studio.
Description of bit operations and their application in the C language. Basic operators when performing bitwise operations.
A little about variables, their types, properties and arithmetic operations. Storing variables in memory and reading from it.
